title: Rotary Club Community Service Recognition
description: Recognized by the Rotary Club of Anuradhapura for exceptional dedication and service to the community.

title: Chief Guest – International Women’s Day Celebration
description: Served as Chief Guest at the International Women’s Day celebration held in Kekirawa.

title: Special Invitee – North Central Province Entrepreneur Awards
description: Special invitee at the North Central Province Entrepreneur Awards organized by NCCIA and NEDA.

title: Climate Change Action Ambassadors Project Launch
description: Launched the ‘Fostering Climate Change Action Ambassadors’ project at Rajarata University of Sri Lanka.

title: Chief Guest – Safe Skills Hub Opening
description: Chief Guest at the opening ceremony of Safe Foundation’s ‘Safe Skills Hub’ in Anuradhapura.

title: Chief Guest – Prefects’ Investiture Ceremony (Swarnapali Balika Vidyalaya)
description: Chief Guest at the Prefects’ Investiture Ceremony of Swarnapali Balika Vidyalaya, Anuradhapura.

title: Newspaper Article – Mawbima
description: Article published in the Mawbima newspaper.

title: Newspaper Article – Mawbima
description: Article published in the Mawbima newspaper.

title: Chief Guest – Kingsgate International School Opening
description: Chief Guest at the opening ceremony of Kingsgate International School, Anuradhapura.

title: Chief Guest – Treevolution Program
description: Chief Guest at the Treevolution Program focused on enhancing food security in Kammalakkulama Village, Mihinthale.

title: Invitee – Regional Entrepreneur Award Ceremony
description: Invitee at the Regional Entrepreneur Award Ceremony organized by the National Chamber of Commerce, Industry and Agriculture – North Central Province.

title: Guest – New Kangara Aushadhalaya Opening

title: Entrepreneurship Discussion – NCCIA & SANASA Bank
description: Discussion with the NCP Chamber of Commerce, Industries and Agriculture and SANASA Development Bank on strengthening entrepreneurs.

description: Chief Guest at the Prefects’ Investiture Ceremony of Ibbagamuwa Central College.
